mapper.select: select E2.envcolumnname as envColumnName, E3.envitem as envItem from PRODUCTENVIRONMENT inner join ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN E on PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.environmentcolumnId = E.environmentcolumnId inner join ENVCOLUMN E2 on E.envcolumnid = E2.envcolumnid inner join ENVITEMLIST E3 on PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.envitemlistid = E3.envitemlistid where PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.productid = #{productId} and E.catid = #{categoryId} and E.status = true order by envcolumnname;
mapper.update: update PRODUCTENVIRONMENT inner join (ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN E2 inner join ENVCOLUMN E3 on E2.envcolumnid = E3.envcolumnid and E2.envcolumnid = (select envcolumnid from ENVCOLUMN where envcolumnname = #{envColumnName})) on PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.environmentcolumnId = E2.environmentcolumnId set PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.envitemlistid = (select envitemlistid from ENVITEMLIST inner join ENVCOLUMN E on ENVITEMLIST.envcolumnid = E.envcolumnid where E.envcolumnname = #{envColumnName} and ENVITEMLIST.envitem = #{envValue}) where PRODUCTENVIRONMENT.productid = #{productId};
mapper.select: select EC.envcolumnname as envColumnName from ENVCOLUMN EC inner join ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN E on EC.envcolumnid = E.envcolumnid where E.catid = #{categoryId}

select E2.envitem as envItem from ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN EC inner join ENVCOLUMN E on EC.envcolumnid = E.envcolumnid inner join ENVITEMLIST E2 on E.envcolumnid = E2.envcolumnid where EC.catid = #{categoryId} and E.envcolumnname = #{envColumnName}
mapper.insert: insert into USERENVIRONMENT (environmentcolumnId, userid, envitemlistid) values ((select environmentcolumnId from ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN inner join ENVCOLUMN E on ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN.envcolumnid = E.envcolumnid where ENVIRONMENTCOLUMN.catid = #{categoryId} and E.envcolumnname = #{envColumnName}), #{username}, (select ENVITEMLIST.envitemlistid from ENVITEMLIST where envitem = #{envValue})) on duplicate key update envitemlistid = (select ENVITEMLIST.envitemlistid from ENVITEMLIST where envitem = #{envValue});
